tags = Array.from(tags.reduce( (a, b) => a.set(b, b) , new Map())).map( v => v[1] );

var options = {
  data: tags,
  list: {
    match: {
      enabled: true
    },
		onClickEvent: function() {
      var keyword = $('.search-form .text').val();
			if(tags.includes(keyword)) {$('.add-keyword').fadeIn();}
		}
	}
};
$(document).ready(function(){$("#keyword-search").easyAutocomplete(options);});
</script>

  $(document).ready(function(){
    function adBlockDetected() {
    	alert('It appears you are using an ad blocker. To enjoy all of Reasonable Faith’s features, it is recommended that you disable your ad blocker.');

        <script type="text/javascript">
        $( document ).ready( function() {

            /*
            ==================================================
                Home Banner Script
            ==================================================
            */
            var $status = $('.paging-info');
            var $slickElement = $('.home-slider');

            $slickElement.on('init reInit afterChange', function (event, slick, currentSlide, nextSlide) {
                //currentSlide is undefined on init -- set it to 0 in this case (currentSlide is 0 based)
                var i = (currentSlide ? currentSlide : 0) + 1;
                $status.html('<em>' + i + '</em>' + ' of ' + slick.slideCount);
            });
            $slickElement.slick({
                autoplay: true,
                speed: 1200,
                autoplaySpeed: 4000,
                dots: true
            });

            $('.page-information-navigation .page-navigation').prepend($slickElement.find('.slick-arrow'))
            $('.page-information-navigation .page-navigation .slick-prev').addClass('icon-arrow-left');
            $('.page-information-navigation .page-navigation .slick-next').addClass('icon-arrow-right');


            /*
            ==================================================
                Podcast video script
            ==================================================
            */
            $('.play_story_link').on('click', function(ev) {
                ev.preventDefault();
                href_link = $(this).attr('href');
                $('#video1').attr('src',href_link);
                $("#adv-overlay").addClass('on');
                $("#adv-overlay").removeClass('exiting');
                $("#adv-overlay").css("z-index",1000);
                $('#video1')[0].src += '?rel=0&autoplay=1';
            });

            $("#adv-overlay #close").click(function(e){
                e.preventDefault();
                $('#video1').attr('src','');
                $('#video1')[0].contentWindow.postMessage('{"event":"command","func":"' + 'stopVideo' + '","args":""}', '*');
                $("#adv-overlay").removeClass('on');
                $("#adv-overlay").addClass('exiting');
                $("#adv-overlay").css("z-index",0);
            });
        });
        </script>

                                        <a href="/writings/scholarly-writings/the-existence-of-god/">The Existence of God</a>
                                        
                                    </li>
<li>                                        
                                        <a href="/writings/scholarly-writings/divine-omniscience/">Divine Omniscience</a>

</ul>

            <div class="home-banner">
                <div class="page-information-navigation">
                    <div class="page-navigation"></div>
                    <span class="paging-info"></span>
                </div>
                <div class="home-slider">
            
            
                <div class="slide" style="background: url(https://www.reasonablefaith.org/images/uploads/SnowArch.jpg)" data-mobile="https://www.reasonablefaith.org/images/uploads/SnowArch.jpg">
                    <!-- home banner caption -->
                    <div class="home-banner-caption">
                        <div class="caption">
                            
                            <div class="caption-title">
                                Reason + Faith
                            </div>
                            
                            
                            <h1 class="">Reasonable Faith aims to provide an intelligent, articulate, and uncompromising yet gracious Christian perspective on the issues concerning the truth of the Christian faith.</h1>
                            
                            
                            <a href="/about" class="btn ">About Us</a>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            
            
                </div>
                <a href="#main-container" class="scroll-down icon-arrow-down"></a>
            </div>
            
            

            <!-- main container part -->
            <div id="main-container">
                <!-- who we are block -->
                                
                <div class="who-we-are-block" style="background: url(/images/site/who-we-are-bg.png) no-repeat center bottom;">
                    <span class="birds-images">
                        <span class="top-left-birds">
                            <img src="/images/site/bird-img-3.png" alt="">
                        </span>
                    </span>
                    <div class="container">
                
                        
                        <h5>WHAT YOU'LL FIND HERE</h5>
                        
                        
                        <h2>Welcome to ReasonableFaith.org!</h2>
                        
                        
                        <div class="half-content">
<p>Here you will find a deep library of writings, videos, podcasts, and more that feature the work of Dr. William Lane Craig. A great place to begin is our short animated video series below.</p>

<p>For a taste of <strong>Dr. Craig&rsquo;s writing</strong> we have a section full of both&nbsp;<a href="/writings/popular-writings/">popular-level articles</a> for a general audience as well as <a href="/writings/scholarly-writings/">academic articles</a> that cover topics in greater depth.</p>

<p><strong>Have a question?</strong> Dr. Craig responds to a weekly <a href="/writings/question-answer/">Question of the Week!</a> You can use our&nbsp;Index to find a particular question or topic.&nbsp; You can also <a href="/writings/question-answer/submit-question">submit a question</a> of your own.</p>

<p><strong>Looking for videos?</strong> You can find us on YouTube at DrCraigvideos, which features short clips, and at ReasonableFaithOrg which hosts full-length videos of Dr. Craig&rsquo;s many debates, lectures, and weekly Defenders Class.</p>
</div>

<div class="half-content">
<p><strong>Don&rsquo;t miss our podcasts!</strong>&nbsp; The Reasonable Faith podcast features lively conversation about the issues of the day. Defenders&nbsp;Livestream on <a href="https://www.facebook.com/reasonablefaithorg/" target="_blank">Facebook</a>&nbsp;is available each week and a rich archive of past series are available on our full-length <a href="https://www.youtube.com/user/ReasonableFaithOrg/playlists?sort=dd&amp;shelf_id=9&amp;view=50" target="_blank">YouTube channel</a>.</p>

<p><strong>Interested in discussion </strong>about the issues raised in Dr. Craig&rsquo;s work? Join our <a href="/forums/">Open Forum</a> or find a local <a href="/chapters/directory/">Reasonable Faith Chapter</a> in your area.&nbsp; See the <a href="/chapters/chapter-application/">RF Chapters</a> section for information on how to start a chapter of your own.</p>

<p>Dr. Craig&rsquo;s <strong>books and recordings</strong> are available for purchase in our <a href="/store">store</a>.</p>

<p>If English is not your first language, please visit the <a href="/translations">Translations</a> page to see what&rsquo;s available in your language.</p>
</div>
                        
                
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                

                <!-- god arguments block -->
                
                                
                <div class="god-arguments-block cf" style="background: url(https://www.reasonablefaith.org/images/uploads/god-argu-bg-cut.png) no-repeat top center;">

                        <div class="god-title-block">
                            <h3>DOES GOD EXIST?</h3>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="video-popup-list">

                                <li>

                <div class="que-week-block">
                    <span class="birds-images">
                        <span class="middle-left-birds">
                            <img src="/images/site/bird-img-6.png" alt="">

                        <span class="top-right-birds">

                    </span>
                                        
                    <div class="container">
                        <h5>Question of the week</h5>
                    
                        <h2>#569 Loving Christ</h2>
                        <p>
                        Dear Dr. Craig,

I know you hear this from a lot of people, but you have had a tremendous impact on my life. Thank you for the work you have done on the rational defense of the Christian Faith and for the many resources you have produced. You&#39;ve turned me from someone who was apathetic about Christianity, to someone who is passionately interested in Christian theology, philosophy and apologeti...
                        </p>
                        <a href="/writings/question-answer/loving-christ/" class="read-more">Read More</a>
                    
                    </div>
